DOC.brief_summary: Specific aim 1 . Using fully cross 2 ( intensity ) X 2 ( duration ) design , investigator demonstrate dose-response relationship volume aerobic exercise change DNA methylation four month among previously sedentary woman . Specific aim 2 . There publish data extent positive effect exercise methylation might decay exercise continue . The investigator gather data natural history methylation decay training .
DOC.brief_title: DNA Methylation Cancer Prevention : Duration Intensity Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: Specific aim 1 . Using fully cross 2 ( intensity ) X 2 ( duration ) design , investigator demonstrate dose-response relationship volume aerobic exercise change DNA methylation four month among previously sedentary woman . - Hypothesis 1 : The investigator predict interaction intensity duration characterize dose-dependent response total exercise volume , woman experience great improvement methylation high intensity/high duration ( 16.4 kcal/kg/week ) least improvement methylation low intensity/low duration ( 5.6 kcal/kg/week ) . - Hypothesis 2 : The investigator predict main effect exercise duration , woman exercise 40 minutes/session , 4 session per week show improvement DNA methylation compare woman exercise 20 minutes/session , 4 session per week . - Hypothesis 3 : The investigator predict main effect exercise intensity , woman exercise 75 % VO2max show improvement DNA methylation compare woman exercise 55 % VO2max . Specific aim 2 . There publish data extent positive effect exercise methylation might decay exercise continue . The investigator gather data natural history methylation decay training . â€¢ Hypothesis 4 : At six month follow end supervise exercise , investigator assess influence different level initial training passage time DNA methylation , covarying whether participant continue exercise . It predict high volume group show great persistence positive change DNA methylation . Alternatively , possible four group return baseline methylation level methylation , difference methylation 6 month follow end supervise exercise .
DOC.criteria: Female Age 3045 Sedentary ( i.e. , < 40 minute per week moderate physical activity past 6months ; criterion relax < 60 minute per week limit enrollment ) Menstruating regularly ( amenorrheic dysmenorrheic ) Nonsmokers Willing accept random assignment condition Willing provide blood saliva sample epigenetic analysis Willing physically capable safely engage moderate exercise activity ( i.e. , injury , physical impairment , preexist contraindication ) assess study physician Able successfully complete VO2max test without evidence cardiac abnormality Planning remain Denver metro area next 10 month Have BMI > 35kg/m2 Are diabetic restrict diet Have uncontrolled hypertension define rest systolic BP > 150 mmHg diastolic BP > 90 mmHg ( assessed physical exam , phone screen ) . ( Participants meet criterion first screen reevaluate , include followup evaluation primary care physician initiation adjustment antihypertensive medication ) Have cardiovascular respiratory disease include subjective objective indicator ischemic heart disease ( e.g. , angina , ST segment depression ) serious arrhythmias rest maximal exercise test ( VO2max ) . ( Participants meet criterion first screen reevaluate ; followup evaluation must include diagnostic testing ( e.g. , thallium stress test ) interpretation cardiologist ) Have history breast neoplasia Are currently receive treatment type cancer Are psychotropic medication Are currently treatment psychiatric disorder Are currently treatment alcohol drug abuse Are currently pregnant attempt become pregnant next 6months
